query:
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.description, p.regularPrice, p.salePrice, c.name as categoryName
FROM products p
LEFT JOIN categories c ON p.categoryId = c.id
WHERE p.status = 'published'
ORDER BY c.id, p.id;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway04.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2vUuSS4u8JGEyYT.root --database 8WruFPRUxPMzzwD4ZeeUDg --execute SELECT p.id, p.name, p.description, p.regularPrice, p.salePrice, c.name as categoryName
FROM products p
LEFT JOIN categories c ON p.categoryId = c.id
WHERE p.status = 'published'
ORDER BY c.id, p.id;

rows.name: Eastern Ancient Wisdom Text Pendant
rows.description: This pendant bears a timeless text rooted in millennia-old Eastern wisdom — sacred scriptures that have long been linked to mindfulness, inner calm, and the quiet strength of spiritual centering. Each piece is elevated by a traditional Eastern ceremonial enlivenment performed at sacred temples, a practice deeply woven into ancient cultural heritage, focused on aligning the piece with the resonant energy of intentional presence. Crafted with polished, durable metals in both lustrous gold and elegant silver finishes, the intricate engraved script (classic passages of Eastern philosophical legacy including Heart Sutra, Great Compassion Mantra, and other sacred texts) and refined design blend understated luxury with profound symbolic depth. Worn close to the body, it serves as a tangible reminder of inner balance — a subtle, elegant link to the quiet wisdom of ancient Eastern traditions. For seekers drawn to the mystique of Eastern cultural heritage and symbolic pieces that carry intentional, centering energy.

rows.name: Heart Sutra Bracelet
rows.description: Meticulously crafted, this bracelet features the complete Heart Sutra (般若波罗蜜多心经) — one of the most revered texts in Eastern philosophy — engraved upon its surface with exquisite precision. Each character holds millennia of wisdom about emptiness, non-attachment, and the path to spiritual liberation. Available in radiant gold and refined silver finishes, this flat-design bracelet (width: 1.0cm, inner circumference: 19cm) combines modern elegance with ancient spiritual power. Blessed in the sacred setting of Wutaishan Mountain by revered masters through traditional methods, it is intended to carry pure, protective energy for spiritual healing, mental clarity, and energy protection. More than jewelry, it is a consecrated spiritual companion designed to help anchor the mind amidst chaos and cultivate a personal aura of serenity and safeguarding. Whether used for mindfulness practice or given as a profoundly meaningful gift, it carries deep intention.

rows.name: Great Compassion Mantra Bracelet
rows.description: This bracelet bears the sacred Great Compassion Mantra (大悲咒) — a powerful dharani revered across Eastern traditions for its ability to invoke the boundless compassion of Avalokitesvara Bodhisattva. The complete mantra is meticulously engraved across the bracelet's surface, each syllable carrying the energy of relief from suffering, emotional healing, health blessings, and comprehensive protection. Crafted in lustrous gold and elegant silver finishes with a flat design (width: 1.0cm, inner circumference: 19cm), this piece seamlessly blends spiritual depth with contemporary aesthetics. Consecrated at Wutaishan Mountain by accomplished masters using time-honored rituals, it is imbued with protective energy that resonates with the wearer's intention. Whether worn during meditation, carried through daily challenges, or gifted to loved ones facing difficulties, this bracelet serves as a tangible connection to the compassionate forces that guide and protect.

rows.name: Shurangama Mantra Bracelet
rows.description: The Shurangama Mantra (楞严咒) is considered the "king of mantras" in Eastern esoteric traditions — the most powerful protective invocation for dispelling negative forces, purifying consciousness, and establishing an impenetrable spiritual shield. This bracelet carries the complete mantra engraved with precision across its surface, each sacred syllable resonating with the energy of ultimate protection and spiritual awakening. Available in three exquisite finishes — radiant gold, refined silver, and elegant rose gold — this flat-design bracelet (width: 1.0cm, inner circumference: 19cm) offers both aesthetic versatility and profound spiritual significance. Blessed at the sacred Wutaishan Mountain by masters trained in esoteric practices, this piece is consecrated to serve as your personal guardian talisman. Practitioners wear it to strengthen their meditation practice, protect against harmful energies, and maintain clarity of mind in all circumstances. For those seeking the highest level of spiritual protection combined with refined craftsmanship.

rows.name: Yellow Jambhala Bracelet
rows.description: Yellow Jambhala (黄财神) is the revered deity of wealth and prosperity in Eastern esoteric traditions, known for bestowing material abundance while cultivating generosity and ethical wealth accumulation. This bracelet features sacred mantras and symbols associated with Yellow Jambhala, meticulously engraved to invoke the deity's blessings of financial prosperity, business success, and the removal of poverty consciousness. Available in two distinctive styles — a bold traditional design and an elegant fine-gold variation — each piece is crafted to resonate with different aesthetic preferences while maintaining the same spiritual potency. Blessed at Wutaishan Mountain through traditional wealth deity invocation rituals, this bracelet is consecrated to attract auspicious opportunities, enhance financial wisdom, and create a magnetic field for prosperity. Ideal for entrepreneurs, business professionals, or anyone seeking to transform their relationship with abundance while maintaining spiritual integrity. Wear it as a daily reminder that true wealth flows from both material success and generous spirit.

rows.name: Amitabha Bracelet
rows.description: This bracelet carries the sacred name "南无阿弥陀佛" (Namo Amitabha Buddha) — the most widely recited invocation in Pure Land Buddhism, representing infinite light, boundless life, and the compassionate vow to guide all beings to liberation. Each repetition of this holy name is believed to purify karma, dispel fear of death, and establish a connection with Amitabha Buddha's Pure Land of Ultimate Bliss. The bracelet features this powerful invocation engraved with devotional precision, transforming a simple accessory into a constant prayer wheel that accompanies your every movement. Crafted in refined metal with elegant design, this piece serves both as a meditation tool and a protective talisman. Blessed at Wutaishan Mountain by masters devoted to Pure Land practice, it carries the energy of peaceful transition, karmic purification, and spiritual refuge. Especially meaningful for practitioners of Pure Land Buddhism, those caring for elderly loved ones, or anyone seeking peace of mind regarding life's ultimate journey. Wear it as a reminder that every moment is an opportunity for mindfulness and every breath can be a prayer.

rows.name: Esoteric North Star Seven-Star Pendant
rows.description: Across ancient civilizations, the Big Dipper (北斗七星) was more than a constellation — it was revered as a symbol of "universal order," a celestial compass for navigation, and a protective sigil for travelers on both physical and spiritual journeys. In Eastern esoteric traditions, the Seven-Star Array is invoked for protection, destiny alignment, and connection to cosmic forces. This pendant carries the weight of that legacy, enhanced by a time-honored ceremonial process that infuses it with the Seven-Star Array's inherent energetic properties. The innovative dual-layer rotating design (can rotate 360 degrees) isn't just aesthetic: it mirrors the Big Dipper's eternal movement across the heavens, acting as a physical reminder to "sync" with the universe's supportive currents. The front displays the seven stars in their sacred configuration, while the reverse features the Eight Trigrams (八卦) representing the fundamental forces of existence. Crafted with precision (pendant diameter: approx. 35.5mm, height: approx. 40.5mm, chain length: approx. 60mm), this piece combines ancient symbolism with contemporary craftsmanship. Worn close to the body, it is said to ward off unbalanced energies, amplify inner clarity and purpose (tied to the Big Dipper's "guidance" legacy), and serve as a tangible link to the cosmos' quiet, protective power. For those who seek alignment with celestial wisdom and cosmic protection.

messages: 510056	Wutai Mountain Incense Offering Service	May all disasters be averted, may the weather be favorable, may all beings be happy, and may peace and good fortune prevail.

As the Buddhist scriptures say, "A single petal of incense fills the ten directions, and all Buddhas can smell it." Amidst the swirling smoke, leave your blessings for your family, friends, and yourself. As long as you have sincere intentions, your wishes will come true.

Burning incense is a sacred religious ritual to pay respects to gods and Buddhas. In Daoism, incense offering is divided into temple master burning incense and altar master offering incense, with specific placement methods and directional significance. Buddhism emphasizes burning three sticks of incense with a pure heart to offer to the Three Treasures of Buddha, Dharma, and Sangha, advocating that "a single petal of incense from the heart" resonates with the Dharma Realm.

Our monks at Wutai Mountain will perform the incense offering ceremony on your behalf, channeling your sincere wishes to the heavens and praying for your peace, health, and prosperity.	79.00	69.00	NULL
510057	Wutai Mountain Lamp Offering Service	Offering lamps for blessings, nurturing love and compassion.

The merit of offering lamps before the Buddha is dedicated to all compassionate beings who have made vows. May all karmic obstacles be eliminated, may blessings and wisdom increase, may all illnesses be eradicated, and may the body be healthy. May wisdom increase, all wishes be fulfilled, and all aspirations be realized.

May the parents of this life be blessed with longevity, and may the parents of past lives, along with all their karmic creditors and relatives from past lives, and all beings they have harmed, as well as those in the hell realm, hungry ghost realm, and animal realm, all be reborn in the Western Pure Land, resolving all karmic debts and knots!

May all Buddhas and Bodhisattvas compassionately protect and bless all beings with increased blessings and wisdom, the elimination of karmic obstacles, family harmony, freedom from suffering and attainment of happiness.
**Available lamp types:** Fortune Lamp, Peace Lamp, Academic Lamp, Marriage Lamp, Wish-Fulfilling Lamp, Wisdom Lamp.
**Price includes one pair (two lamps). You can choose multiple pairs for different blessings.**	79.00	69.00	NULL

510058	Incense Offering & Consecration Package with Blessed Amulet	A comprehensive blessing package combining the sacred rituals of incense offering and consecration (Kāiguāng), with a portable blessed amulet included.

**Incense Offering Ritual:** As the Buddhist scriptures say, "A single petal of incense fills the ten directions, and all Buddhas can smell it." Our monks will perform the incense offering ceremony on your behalf, channeling your sincere wishes to the heavens.

**Consecration (Kāiguāng) Ritual:** This ancient ritual endows objects with spirituality and sacredness through specific ceremonies. In Buddhism, consecration ceremonies are performed by high monks who recite sutras and mantras, awakening the "spiritual essence" of the object and making it a tool to assist believers in their spiritual practice.

**Blessed Amulet Included:** You will receive a consecrated amulet that has been blessed by Wutai Mountain senior monks. These portable talismans can be placed in cars, phone cases, wallets, bedside tables, or carried with you for protection and blessings.

For believers, consecrated items are regarded as a medium connecting them to deities or Buddhist teachings, enhancing faith and dispelling fear. The ritual provides a sense of stability through spiritual connection, helping individuals focus their minds and alleviate anxiety.	179.00	159.00	NULL

510059	Complete Blessing Ceremony: Lamp Offering, Incense & Consecration with Amulet	The ultimate blessing package combining three sacred rituals: lamp offering, incense offering, and consecration, with a blessed amulet included.

**Lamp Offering Ritual:** The merit of offering lamps before the Buddha is dedicated to all compassionate beings. May all karmic obstacles be eliminated, may blessings and wisdom increase, may all illnesses be eradicated, and may the body be healthy. Available lamp types include Fortune Lamp, Peace Lamp, Academic Lamp, Marriage Lamp, Wish-Fulfilling Lamp, and Wisdom Lamp.

**Incense Offering Ritual:** A single incense stick, a heartfelt wish, a blessing—blessings from Wutai Mountain. May disasters be averted, may the weather be favorable, may all beings be happy, and may peace and good fortune prevail. Our monks will perform the incense offering ceremony on your behalf.

**Consecration (Kāiguāng) Ritual:** This ancient ritual endows objects with spirituality and sacredness. Buddhist consecration ceremonies are performed by high monks who recite sutras and mantras, awakening the "spiritual essence" of the object and making it a tool to assist believers in their spiritual practice.

**Blessed Amulet Included:** You will receive a consecrated amulet that has been blessed through all three rituals by Wutai Mountain senior monks. These portable talismans can be placed in cars, phone cases, wallets, bedside tables, or carried with you for maximum protection and blessings.
This comprehensive package provides the most powerful spiritual support, combining the blessings of light, fragrance, and sacred energy to protect you and your loved ones.	229.00	209.00	NULL
